cupp::memory1d

cupp::memory1d< T > Class Template Reference

Represents a memory block on an associated CUDA device. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class cupp::memory1d< T >

Represents a memory block on an associated CUDA device.

Author:
Bj√∂rn Knafla: Initial design

Jens Breitbart
